review: One star because this thing over heats, cuts out and won't stream, and too boot I have sent multiple emails and requests for support and I have gotten nothing but more emails telling me to email support again so they can contact me at a later date.  I believe a week later would sufice.

review: I use a hot spot for wifi I have tried a lot of different ways to watch tv and movies, Fire TV stick has been the best way I've found yet. Chrome cast didn't even work this well way to go Amazon

review: I thought one of the features was to access HBO Go. It's not. HBO Now is an option, but I don't even know what that is....
